snippet.title: Bunker Survival - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to wishlist -https://store.steampowered.com/app/1583020/Bunker_Survival/

People, forced to hide underground due to negative human activities and climate change. In this shattered world, bunkers are the only safe places to stay for more than a few hours. Living outside will cause death. To survive in this hostile world, to obtain food and the necessary equipment, you will have to expose yourself to radiation and fight other creatures, venturing deeper and deeper into the contaminated land. Will you survive?

Add us to wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/BunkerSurvival
Join our Discord: http://bit.ly/GIDiscord
Like us on Facebook: http://bit.ly/GameIslandYT
